body:
Dear Radiance staff and users:


I installed successfully Radiance for Windows version two months ago on my
computer.


Having asked my research assistant to do the same, she attempted to install
under Windows 7 and got the message: "the application has failed to start
due to an incorrect side-by-side configuration is incorrect." She was
suggested to see application event log or use the command-line sxstrace.exe
tool for more detail.


Someone knows what I could try?


Prof. Aloísio Leoni Schmid, Dr.Ing
Curitiba - Brazil
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2013-July/009620.html).</sup>
